text: 2:3 Rom 5:12; Galesia 5:16; Kolosi 3:6; Taitus 3:3; 1 Pita 4:3Fomɨra e bar moghɨra men mɨn ami, egha uan navir ghurimɨn ifongiamɨn gɨn zui. E uan inivafɨzir agorogem ko uan nɨghnɨzir kurabar gɨn zui. Dughiar kamɨn e nguazimɨn itir gumazamizibar mɨn amima, kamaghɨn God bar en arazir kuraba bagh ivezir kuram e danɨngasa nɨghnɨzim gami.
